name: Kickflip, The Horse
description:
Kickflip is a horse who's reached the final stages of equestrian evolution. Ride, kickflip & grind your way around a miniature world with secrets to discover.

Controller recommended, keyboard supported.

This was made over a week by Ash (ashashza) and Danny (dislekcia) for Physics Jam 2021.

  • Music from YouTube Audio Library.
  • City assets by Kenney.
  • Skate assets by aandyh.
